committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development

official_title: To prohibit the use of certain assistance provided under the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 and the Housing and Community Development Act of 1992 for employment relocation activities.
short_title: Prohibition of Incentives for Relocation Act of 1994

summary.text: Prohibition of Incentives for Relocation Act of 1994 - Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 and the Housing and Community Development Act of 1992 to prohibit the use of specified grant and loan assistance for employment relocation activities.

titles.title: Prohibition of Incentives for Relocation Act of 1994
To prohibit the use of certain assistance provided under the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 and the Housing and Community Development Act of 1992 for employment relocation activities.
